title: Elitewheels Drive 2: Wide Aero Wheelset Review
content: Test Set and Measurements The wheels tested were a mixed depth set, 50 mm front and 65 mm rear. The recommendation is simple: buy 65 front and rear. Shallower rims have a lower critical speed and will become dynamically unstable earlier. If you value stability, avoid the super shallow option. The hooks on these rims...
author: admin
